SMTS-Systems Engineering Chennai, India Full-Time Technology What youll be doing... Our customers have high expectations for our digital eCommerce platforms - speed, responsiveness and constant availability. Thats where you come in. You will guide team members to design and implement efficient solutions to complex problems and meet critical business needs. Your optimization and performance skills will help other engineering teams and our vendors drive better digital eCommerce architecture and solutions. Leading the server side architecture development for failover and clustering solutions. Crafting, evaluating and detailing clustering, load testing and performance testing solutions for applications. Working with digital operations to gather requirements and design, develop and implement projects. Monitoring metrics and system health and quickly identifying and resolving problems. Defining requirements, design and set-up of new environments to demonstrate proof of concept. What were looking for... You view technology through a lens of making things better and more effective. Understanding and building continual improvements to the digital value chain is something you flourish with. You enjoy the process of solving complex issues while empowering the team around you to do the same. People count on you to have strong domain experience in eCommerce application tools, digital delivery methods, and all aspects of production. Youll need to have Bachelors degree or four or more years of work experience. Six or more years of relevant work experience. Experience developing and optimizing server architectures. Even better if you have A degree. Experience with Java/ J2EE, Oracle Coherence, WebLogic, Oracle, iPlanet, Rational Rose, XML, Solaris and PL/SQL. Experience in Oracle commerce platform ATG/Endeca. Experience in systems design and project management. Additional qualifications Experience in Java, Sprint boot 10,Sprint Reactive API development and Microservices. Experience in AWSCloud/Kubernetes. When you join Verizon... Youll have the power to go beyond doing the work thats transforming how people, businesses and things connect with each other. Not only do we provide the fastest and most reliable network for our customers, but we were first to 5G - a quantum leap in connectivity. Our connected solutions are making communities stronger and enabling energy efficiency. Here, youll have the ability to make an impact and create positive change. Whether you think in code, words, pictures or numbers, join our team of the best and brightest. We offer great pay, amazing benefits and opportunity to learn and grow in every role. Together well go far. Diversity and Inclusion at Verizon At Verizon, we know that diversity makes us stronger. We are committed to a collaborative, inclusive environment that encourages authenticity and fosters a sense of belonging. We strive for everyone to feel valued, connected, and empowered to reach their potential and contribute their best. Check out our diversity and inclusion page to learn more.

  • Train developed NLP models and evaluate their effectiveness
  • Conduct statistical analyses of models, and adjust models where possible
  • Extend machine learning frameworks and libraries for NLP projects.

Required Skills For This Role Include
  • Overall IT Experience: 5 to 7 years, of which atleast 4 to 5 years of experience in Natural Language Processing Development
  • Strong knowledge of NLP Techniques for text representation, semantic extraction techniques, data structures and modeling.
  • Must have solid hands on experience on Open Computer Vision (Open CV)
  • image processing Experience in developing Automations in: Automation Anywhere and any RPA Platform
  • Hands on experience on Image Processing/CV.
  • Ability to effectively design software architecture
  • Deep understanding of text representation techniques (such as n-grams, bag of words, sentiment analysis etc),statistics and classification algorithms
  • Knowledge of
    • Language – Python, R , Core Java , C
    • Database – SQL Server, Redis, MongoDB, MySQL
    • Libraries – Pytorch, tensorflow, keras, Flask, Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Django
    • Algorithms – Neural Networks (CNN, RNN, LSTM) , Decision Trees, Clustering , Data structures
  • Ability to write robust and testable code
  • Experience with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like Pandas, Numpy, scikit-learn)
  • Strong communication skills – Proficiency in English
  • An analytical mind with problem-solving abilities
  • Willingness to work overtime, when necessary, to meet project deadlines

Job Scope
    • Produce technical training content - must have proven ability to write content about data concepts, products and technologies

    • Create training material using designs and outlines created by others
    • Create, deploy and evaluate student experience assets (LMS courses or pages, assessment activities
    • Create the final polish for all customer-delivered content by using extraordinary attention-to-detail
    • Understand the data ecosystem and the data catalog to ensure the best content delivery

Responsibilities: Produce and maintain training assets
    • Develop technical eLearning content using modern production tools (Articulate, Captivate, Camtasia) about a data software product, a data catalog
    • Perform regular production tasks on eLearning assets (edit videos, produce LMS compatible outputs, integrate media and interactions)
    • Organize and manage training assets for internal use with the training department
    • Organize and manage training assets for accepted use by co-workers from other departments
    • Create and maintain systems, processes and communications to curate content, encouraging others to build and share their wisdom.

Responsibilities: Build the training content library
    • Write training content for eLearning or Instructor led training material
    • Apply instructional design and learning theory concepts to create useful, engaging, fun training experiences
    • Curate training material from multiple sources to provide fast paths to training solutions
    • Develop expertise in Alation’s product
    • Maintain training material. Review product changes and apply changes to content where needed.
Required Experience/Skills
    • Technical competency - a fundamental understanding of data, with at least 1-2 years experience building training for a technical audience such as administrators or developers.
    • Technical skills may include databases, analytical tools, scripting languages, HTML, CSS, SQL, APIs and integration, networking, storage.
    • 3-5 years experience writing training or documentation. Writing Samples will be required.
    • 2 years experience building technical training content for software or hardware customers

    • Knowledge of instructional design and earning theory
    • Demonstrated experience and proficiency with eLearning tools (examples: Articulate 360, Articulate Presenter, Techsmith Camtasia, Adobe Captivate)
    • Excellent writing skills. You will be the model for the company – your writing must be correct.
    • Imagination and creativity. We have fun working, and want our customers to have fun learning.
More About Alation

Our founders have come together from different backgrounds: business, engineering, and design. This unique mix from our founding team is important to the Alation culture story. Today, our team consists of creators and communicators with varied backgrounds - from Stanford, to the Indian Institute of Technology, big companies and one-person startups, the United States, and abroad. We continue to seek ever more diverse perspectives as we grow.

Why Alation?

  • Market-Leading Data Catalog Provider
  • High-growth, collaborative environment with diverse and inclusive teams
  • Continuous learning, enrichment and development opportunities
  • Competitive pay and health offerings
  • Flexible time off to relax and recharge

,
We are hiring 2016-2020 Fresh Graduates preferably from the Life Science stream for our new project in Medical Coding.

Medical Coding is a system based job working with patients medical reports to analyze and convert them to numerical codes for billing purpose.

The US HIPAA Privacy Rule signed by Bill Clinton in 1996, protects most “individually identifiable health information” held or transmitted by a covered entity or its business associate, in any form or medium, whether electronic, on paper, or oral. The Privacy Rule calls this information protected health information (PHI).

Medical Coder plays an important part in the field of Healthcare to maintain the standards of PHI. According to the Bureau of Labor and Statistics, the medical billing and coding field is expected to grow by 15% between now and 2024. That's almost 30,000 job openings in the next seven-year.

Benefits of Medical Coding Job:
1. Salary: 14k to 20k for Entry Level Coders
2. Salary Growth: 3k to 5k (6 months to yearly)
3. Excellent knowledge growth in the field of healthcare
4. Health Insurance Coverage
5. Food Coupons
6. Incentives and Gifts for outstanding performance
7. Opportunity to work Globally

,
Hitachi ABB Power Grids is a pioneering technology leader that is helping to increase access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all. We help to power your home, keep the factories running, and our hospitals and schools open. Come as you are and prepare to get better as you learn from others. Bring your passion, bring your energy, and plug into a team that appreciates a simple truth: Diversity + Collaboration = Great Innovation

The Hitachi ABB Power Grids Operations Center (INOPC) is a competence center with around 900 skilled engineers who focus on tendering, engineering, planning, procurement, functional system testing, installation supervision and commissioning. However, over the last decade, it has evolved to become the largest engineering hub. The India Operations Centre is a key aspect of the Power Grids business Power Up transformation program. The INOPC team at Chennai supports Hitachi ABB Power Grid’s units in more than 25 countries across a wide portfolio of all the four business units in Power Grid business. To date, the team has executed engineering and commissioning for projects in more than 60 countries.

Your Responsibilities
  • FCM File management.
  • Administrating & Operating MS Team for the HUB.
  • Support factories to increase the usage of MS Teams.
  • Monitoring data quality & taking steps to improve the data quality.
  • Supporting the sales operations team.
  • Using of tools like – PowerBI, Advanced excel, SharePoint to create reports.
  • Develop dashboard & reports for demand side and supply factories.
  • Implementation of Configurators for the HUB.
  • Providing training to users for SFDC.
  • Living core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.
Your background
  • Bachelor’s degree from a reputed university.
  • 2-4 Years of experience, with a combination of engineering and/or Sales Operation/Analytics.
  • Basic understanding of electrical and mechanical systems.
  • Knowledge in Salesforce, PowerBI, SharePoint.
  • Proficiency with CRM and BI tool landscape.
  • Excellent command over English and preferable if have knowledge of French language.
  • True team player.
  • Marketing and Sales acumen (with previous customer-facing experience preferably).
  • Ability to perform data entry for proposals & orders using internal tools.
  • Proven development and maintenance of positive, cooperative, team-oriented relationships with co-workers, supervisors, managers, clients and others in contact with the job.
